User Story & Description: As a player, I want to see an empty 3x3 grid so I can start a new game.,Create UI, Implement grid data structure,A 3x3 grid is displayed on the screen, visually representing empty cells.

As a player, I want to be able to click on a cell to place my mark (X or O).,Implement click handling, Update grid data structure, Display mark,Clicking an empty cell places the correct mark (X or O) in the cell. The visual representation of the cell updates with the mark.
As a player, I want the game to alternate turns between X and O.,Implement turn switching logic,The game automatically switches turns between players after each valid move.

As a player, I want the game to detect when a player has won.,Implement win condition logic, Check rows, columns, and diagonals,The game correctly detects a win based on 3 in a row (horizontally, vertically, or diagonally). A winning message is displayed.

As a player, I want the game to detect when the game is a draw.,Implement draw condition logic, Check for full grid,The game correctly detects a draw when all cells are filled and no player has won. A draw message is displayed.

As a player, I want to be able to start a new game after the game has ended.,Implement reset functionality, Clear grid data,A 'New Game' button is available. Clicking it resets the grid to an empty state, and the game restarts.
As a player, I want to easily see the difference between X and O on the board.,Implement visual distinction for X and O.,X and O are visually distinct (e.g., different colors or shapes).

As a player, I don't want to be able to click on an already occupied cell.,Implement cell click validation,Clicking an occupied cell does not change the cell's value, and the player's turn is not skipped.

As a player, I want to see the number of wins for each player and the number of draws.,Implement statistics tracking and display,The number of wins for each player (X and O) and the number of draws are displayed to the user.
As a player, I want to be able to choose whether I want to play as X or O.,Implement player selection functionality.,Before the game starts, the player is prompted to select X or O.
